name: Young Oscar San (alpha version)
description:
A mysterious kid has stolen a golden diamond from de main shrine of Teen Land and has become a dictator. Now with the golden power of it, he's using other people to serve him at his mercy.

Legend has it that sooner or later two little heroes: a boy and a girl, will join forces to defeat evil.

===========================================================

- Attack enemies and other objects that are in your way. You can collect some power-ups from them to make your task easier.

- Explore 8 different places through a peculiar world named Teen Land: A wilderness field, a mysterious forest, a hot mountain, a strange factory and even frozen place.

- Discover the responsible of the disaster.

===========================================================

NOTE: This is an alpha version (prototype) of the game. The game itself is still in development so anything could change in the final version. Any critic is welcomed. You can leave you feedback in the comments below.
